get.description: Load a job ad by ID

parameters.name: X-Fields
parameters.description: An optional fields mask

get.description: Load a logo binary file by ID

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: Required API key

parameters.name: x-feature-freetext-bool-method
parameters.description: Boolean method to use for unclassified freetext words. Defaults to "and".

parameters.name: published-before
parameters.description: Fetch job ads published before specified date and time (format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: published-after
parameters.description: Fetch job ads published after specified date and time.Accepts either datetime (format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS) or number of minutes (e.g 120 means published in the last two hours)

parameters.name: occupation-name
parameters.description: One or more occupational codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: occupation-group
parameters.description: One or more occupational group codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: occupation-field
parameters.description: One or more occupational area codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: skill
parameters.description: One or more competency codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: One or more language codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: worktime-extent
parameters.description: One or more codes for worktime extent, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: parttime.min
parameters.description: For part-time jobs, minimum extent in percent (for example 50 for 50%)

parameters.name: parttime.max
parameters.description: For part-time jobs, maximum extent in percent (for example 100 for 100%)

parameters.name: driving-license-required
parameters.description: Set to true if driving license required, false if not

parameters.name: driving-license
parameters.description: One or more types of demanded driving licenses, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: employment-type
parameters.description: Employment type, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: experience
parameters.description: Input 'false' to filter jobs that don't require experience

parameters.name: municipality
parameters.description: One or more municipality codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One or more region codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: One or more country codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Latitude and longitude in the format "59.329,18.068" (latitude,longitude)

parameters.name: position.radius
parameters.description: Radius from the specified position (latitude,longitude) in kilometers (km)

parameters.name: employer
parameters.description: Name or organisation number (numbers only, no dashes or spaces) of employer

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Freetext query. Search in ad headline, ad description and place of work

parameters.name: qfields
parameters.description:
Fields to freetext search in, in addition to default freetext search (parameter q)
Valid input values: ['occupation', 'skill', 'location', 'employer']
Default (no input): Search in ad headline, ad description and place of work

parameters.name: contextual
parameters.description: Set to false to disable contextual typeahead (default: true)

parameters.name: x-feature-allow-empty-typeahead
parameters.description: Allow empty querystring in typeahead.

parameters.name: X-Fields
parameters.description: An optional fields mask

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: Required API key

parameters.name: x-feature-freetext-bool-method
parameters.description: Boolean method to use for unclassified freetext words. Defaults to "and".

parameters.description: Fetch job ads published before specified date and time (format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS)

parameters.name: published-after
parameters.description: Fetch job ads published after specified date and time.Accepts either datetime (format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS) or number of minutes (e.g 120 means published in the last two hours)

parameters.name: occupation-name
parameters.description: One or more occupational codes according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: worktime-extent
parameters.description: One or more codes for worktime extent, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: parttime.min
parameters.description: For part-time jobs, minimum extent in percent (for example 50 for 50%)

parameters.name: parttime.max
parameters.description: For part-time jobs, maximum extent in percent (for example 100 for 100%)

parameters.name: driving-license-required
parameters.description: Set to true if driving license required, false if not

parameters.name: driving-license
parameters.description: One or more types of demanded driving licenses, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: employment-type
parameters.description: Employment type, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: experience
parameters.description: Input 'false' to filter jobs that don't require experience

parameters.name: municipality
parameters.description: One or more municipality codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: One or more region codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: One or more country codes, code according to the taxonomy

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Latitude and longitude in the format "59.329,18.068" (latitude,longitude)

parameters.name: position.radius
parameters.description: Radius from the specified position (latitude,longitude) in kilometers (km)

parameters.name: employer
parameters.description: Name or organisation number (numbers only, no dashes or spaces) of employer

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Freetext query. Search in ad headline, ad description and place of work

parameters.name: qfields
parameters.description:
Fields to freetext search in, in addition to default freetext search (parameter q)
Valid input values: ['occupation', 'skill', 'location', 'employer']
Default (no input): Search in ad headline, ad description and place of work

parameters.name: relevance-threshold
parameters.description: Set a result relevance threshold between 0 and 1

parameters.name: resdet
parameters.description: Show 'full' (default) or 'brief' results details

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetchValid range is (0-2000)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to fetch (0-100)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorting.
relevance: relevance (points) (default sorting)
pubdate-desc: published date, descending (newest job ad first)
pubdate-asc: published date, ascending (oldest job ad first)
applydate-desc: last apply date, descending (newest apply date first)
applydate-asc: last apply date, descending (oldest apply date first, few days left for application)
updated: sort by update date (descending)

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: Show statistics for specified fields (available fields: occupation-name, occupation-group and occupation-field)

parameters.name: stats.limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of statistical rows per field

parameters.name: X-Fields
parameters.description: An optional fields mask

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of result rows to fetch

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Freetext query for fetching a filtered result. (for example for autocomplete / type ahead)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: filter by type (available choices: ['occupation-name', 'occupation-group', 'occupation-field', 'skill', 'municipality', 'region', 'country', 'place', 'wage-type', 'worktime-extent', 'driving-license', 'employment-type', 'language'])

parameters.name: show-count
parameters.description: fetch the number of job ads that matches a taxonomy value (only available when chosen type is provided)

parameters.name: parent-id
parameters.description: filter search for taxonomy values by specific parent conceptId (useful in combination with the type parameter)

info.title: Search job ads
info.description: An API for searching and retrieving job ads and for finding concepts in the Jobtech Taxonomy.

tags.name: Open AF-job ads
tags.description: Search and retrieve Arbetsförmedlingens (AF) job ads. Used for online operations.

tags.name: Jobtech Taxonomy
tags.description: Find concepts in the Jobtech Taxonomy.

ParseError.description: When a mask can't be parsed

MaskError.description: When any error occurs on mask
